attributes.action: please stop the large hadron collider
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i do not appreciate our planet having fears of destruction, because of a few scientists wanting to know the knowledge of what happen at the beginning of the earth
please, for the sake of our future, can you help put a stop to the possible toubles that the machine may cause on wednesdays launch
i beg of you as a governement, please do not allow that machine to be launched
for the fear of my family, friends and the whole planet
please stop that machine from being launched
please
ive never feared for my life, and the life of others as much as i have today
those who have created the machine, must either reconsider the possible outcome, and stop the use of this machine as a whole
and also be sued for the troubles and worry they have caused to the billions of people who live on this planet!
thank you for taking ur time to read this 
and please reply as soon as possible

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
